GetStart.title: Update Your Application with MirrorChyan
GetStart.description:
MirrorChyan is a third-party application distribution platform

that makes updating open-source applications easier.

Users pay for access, and the revenue is shared with developers.

Plus, MirrorChyan itself is open source.

Checkout.privacyNotice: By clicking Confirm Payment, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
Checkout.paymentError: An error occurred during payment, please try again later
Checkout.completeYourOrder: Complete your order and get MirrorChyan service
Checkout.incompleteOrder: The order information is incomplete or invalid. Please return to select the plan
Checkout.scanQRCodeToPay: Scan QR code to complete payment
Checkout.paymentNote: After successful payment, the system will automatically generate a CDK for you
Checkout.createOrderError: Failed to create order, please try again

Transmission.title: Time Transfer
Transmission.description: Transfer the validity period of an order to another order
Transmission.orderTooOld: Order creation date is more than 3 days ago
Transmission.rewardNotStarted: Redeem code has not started yet
Transmission.rewardFillInLeft: Please fill in the redeem code on the left
Transmission.rewardUsedUp: Redeem code has been used up

Download.title: Download {rid} {os} {arch}
Download.disclaimer:
As a third-party distribution platform, MirrorChyan only charges for download acceleration services, which does not mean that {rid} requires a paid subscription.

You can still download and use it for free through {rid}'s official channels. Please refer to the User Agreement for complete instructions.
Download.8001: The resources corresponding to the system and architecture do not exist
Download.7002: Please confirm that you have entered the correct CDKey
Download.7003: Your CDKey has reached the most downloads today
Download.7004: Current cdk cannot download this resource, please check your cdk type
